attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the proposed constitution of the EU, as proposed by Chancellor Angela Merkel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand that there is a referendum about accepting or rejecting the proposed EU constitution.  This constitution is being proposed by the German Chancellor Angela Merkel, during her period of Presidency of the EU.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
